name: RTCDataChannel.bufferedAmount
description: The read-only RTCDataChannel property bufferedAmount returns the number of bytes of data currently queued to be sent over the data channel.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCDataChannel.bufferedAmount' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
